name: Ganoderma Kafes(ganoderma lucidum)
short_description:
Ganoderma lucidum or reishi mushroom as it commonly known, is fungus that often thrives on tree stumps or logs throughout Asia. Ganoderma extract has numerous medicinal properties and it’s used to treat and array of diseases ranging from high blood pressure and diabetes to infections and altitude sickness. It has been an integral part of the traditional Chinese medicine for over 4000 years and recently, it has found its way into the United States healing field. Pore over the following editorial and learn more about the extract.
History
In Chinese, the name lingzhi represents a combination of spiritual potency and essence of immortality, and is regarded as the “herb of spiritual potency,” symbolizing success, well-being, divine power, and longevity. Among cultivated mushrooms, G. lucidum..
